record.name: Get CI list from addtional properties

rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to get CI list from addtional properties
rule.conditionDesc: ( Cmdb Update Has Done in CurrentRecord = NULL)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Cmdb Update Has Done">cmdb.update.has.done</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to get CI list from addtional properties (when ( Cmdb Update Has Done in CurrentRecord = NULL))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"\u0009var t=true;\u000a if(record.current_phase!=\"CMDB Update\"){\u000a\u0009\u0009t=false\u000a\u0009}\u000a\u0009\u000a\u0009if(record.CIListContext!==null && record.CIListContext.length()>0){\u000a for(var i=0; i<record.CIListContext.length(); i++){\u000a\u0009\u0009 if(record.CIListContext[i]!=null && record.CIListContext[i].length!=0){\u000a\u0009\u0009\u0009t=false;\u000a break;\u000a\u0009\u0009 }\u000a }\u000a\u0009}\u000a\u000a if(t){\u000a\u0009 record.CIListContext=lib.RequestTaskService.getTicketContextCMDBUpdateList(record);\u000a }"}
